title: Index of Production of Chemical Products for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1923-1939 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted, 1939-1953 (3)--Original Data, 1947-1957. Data Was Adjusted Upwards On The Basis Of New Census Data. Source: Federal Reserve Index Of Industrial Production, October 1943; Federal Reserve Bulletin, Monthly Issues From January 1944 On.

This NBER data series m01279b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01279b
